name: venndev/vosaka-fourotines
description: Structured async programming for PHP using Fibers, inspired by Kotlin Coroutines. Features AsyncIO (non-blocking streams), ForkProcess (low-overhead child processes), Flow/SharedFlow/StateFlow with backpressure, Channels, Mutex, and cooperative scheduling. Can integrate with VOsaka.

suggest.ext-pcntl: Enables ForkProcess for low-overhead IO dispatch via pcntl_fork() (~1-5ms vs ~50-200ms). Linux/macOS only.
suggest.ext-posix: Used by ForkProcess for immediate child exit via posix_kill(). Linux/macOS only.
suggest.ext-sysvsem: Enables semaphore-based Mutex locking (faster than file locks). Linux/macOS only.
suggest.ext-apcu: Enables APCu-based Mutex locking (in-memory, very fast). Requires APCu extension.
suggest.ext-event: Future: potential integration for epoll/kqueue-based event loop (not yet used).
